data.title: Products
data.text:
Collections support

Providing the help librarians and faculty need to get started and increase database usage.

Platform support

The support you need at every stage to make your digital collections project a success.

Customer queries

For general queries, get in touch and let us know how the Support team can help.

Webinars

AM specialists and guest experts share practical tools and advice. Watch live or catch up on demand.

Case studies

Customer success stories and user examples to help get the most out of our products.

Blog

Advice and expertise from AM and special guest posts from leading archivists, academics and librarians.

Podcasts

AM and a host of guest speakers discuss tech, teaching and primary sources. Listen back for inspiration.

News

The very latest news, feature articles and press releases from AM and our partners.

Archive partnerships

Discover more about how we create our resources, our digitisation processes, and working with the AM team.

Mission

Our mission represents who we are and what we do. It is core to our values and our promise to customers.

Solution partners

We partner with specialist service providers to help us to enhance our offering to libraries and archives.

Meet the team

AM editors, engagement and platform specialists work closely with the global education and heritage communities.
